languageKey.label: Automatic CSV import
Automatic import of CSV data to powermail
URL of file to import (with http://)
Field delimiter
Field enclosure
File encoding
First line contains field names (do not import)
Number of rows to be imported (empty = all)
Page ID where to store imported data
Form UID where fields are defined

Field connections (one line per field)
CSV-Columnnumber = Powermail-Uid
Example:
1 = uid100
2 = uid101
3 = uid107
No Page id defined!

Quotation marks (single)
